tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE electronic_waste_disposal_regulations (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    regulation_code VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    regulation_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    compliance_requirement TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ComplianceRequirements (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  regulation_id INT NOT NULL,
  requirement_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (regulation_id) REFERENCES WasteRegulations(id)
);

CREATE TABLE disposal_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disposal_date DATE,
  disposal_site_id INT,
  disposal_company_id INT,
  disposed_quantity DOUBLE
);
